name: Danaher Corporation
headquarters: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
summary: Danaher Corporation is a leading global innovator in life sciences, diagnostics, and biotechnology, providing advanced solutions to improve human health. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Washington, D.C., Danaher operates worldwide with a focus on continuous improvement and customer satisfaction, and is recognized for its strategic acquisitions and the Danaher Business System.
